solution_line_template: After giving {zenny_apples} apples to Zenny, Yanna remained with {total_apples} - {zenny_apples} = <<{total_apples}-{zenny_apples}={apples_after_zenny}>>{apples_after_zenny} apples.
Since she also gave Andrea {andrea_apples} apples, Yanna remained with {apples_after_zenny} - {andrea_apples} = <<{apples_after_andrea}={apples_after_andrea}>>{apples_after_andrea} apples
